property.name: OT_SUPERSCRIPT
property.shortdesc: For OpenType fonts, uses--if available--raised glyphs that are sized correctly relative to the surrounding characters.

property.name: OT_SUBSCRIPT
property.shortdesc: For OpenType fonts, uses--if available--lowered glyphs that are sized correctly relative to the surrounding characters.

property.name: OT_NUMERATOR
property.shortdesc: For OpenType fonts, shrinks the text but keeps the top of the characters aligned with the top of the main text. Note: Valid only for numeric characters.

property.name: OT_DENOMINATOR
property.shortdesc: For OpenType fonts, shrinks the text but keeps text on the main text baseline. Note: Valid only for numeric characters.
